Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.controllers.ControllerContext

  • Packages that use ControllerContext 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.controllers
    Contains all classes to manage the implementations of controllers.

    • Uses of ControllerContext in org.pepstock.charba.client

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Controller.addElementAndReset(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, int index)
      Create a single element for the data at the given index and reset its state.
      void Controller.addElements(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart)
      Create elements for each piece of data in the dataset.
      void Controller.draw(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, double ease)
      Draw the representation of the dataset.
      void Controller.initialize(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, int datasetIndex)
      Initializes the controller.
      void Controller.removeHoverStyle(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, StyleElement element)
      Remove hover styling from the given element.
      void Controller.setHoverStyle(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, StyleElement element)
      Add hover styling to the given element.
      void Controller.update(ControllerContext context, AbstractChart<?,?> chart, boolean reset)
      Update the elements in response to new data.
